amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 117-10 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 1, 4, 9, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, and 17.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 1 comprised of amendments numbered 1, 4, 9, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, and 17, printed in Part B of House Report 117-10.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 196 (Roll no. 67).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
